alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:24PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otero, eastern Sierra and northeastern Dona Ana Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 724 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Northrup Landing, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northrup Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes
